repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Malaiyakarāti, alias the Akattiyar Akarāti, a dictionary of medicinal plants, attributed to Akattiyar.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

supportDesc.condition: Fairly good state of preservation, despite boreholes.

collation.desc: the front cover. Shelfmark and bequest stickers on recto.
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation. Single folio (i.e. half of a double folio). Shelfmark son recto. Verso blank. 375 x 40 mm.
57 folios = Malaiyakarāti. Tamil foliation 1-57. Single folios. f57v blank. Layout in columns. Unblackened additions on many pages. 375 x 40 mm.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 230 (front cover, recto).
BnF bequest sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).
Shelfmark sticker (Société Asiatique?), written in black ink: 690.

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 375 x 35 mm. Shelfmark and bequest stickers.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to circa 1820 by Vinson (1866-), to 1820 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 37.
James, Gregory (2000). Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 701.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 54r, no. 215 230.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.
